h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss - Mother of Stone
content: Unlike the Red Waves wolf transformation, you’ll be extremely slow, unable to dodge, and overall be a pretty big target. On the plus side, you’ll be immune to all status effects while transformed, and deal incredible damage that staggers most enemies. Instead of Might building on attack, you’ll build it while taking damage, allowing you to soak blows and unleash a powerful jump attack spell in return!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Man-in-Stone_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Man-in-Stone Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Man-in-Stone' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss - Mother of Stone'.
The content is as follows:
Unlike the Red Waves wolf transformation, you’ll be extremely slow, unable to dodge, and overall be a pretty big target. On the plus side, you’ll be immune to all status effects while transformed, and deal incredible damage that staggers most enemies. Instead of Might building on attack, you’ll build it while taking damage, allowing you to soak blows and unleash a powerful jump attack spell in return!
